items.title: The economy’s at risk of plunging into an air pocket, says JPMorgan. What that would mean for stocks now and in the future.
items.author: Barbara Kollmeyer
items.description: JPMorgan warns that the economy is at risk of an 'air pocket', which could have negative implications for the stock market in the near and long term. Investors need to be better prepared for potential economic turbulence this year.

items.title: Ally Financial: Buy, Sell, or Hold?
items.author: Neil Patel
items.description: Ally Financial, a digital-only financial services company, has seen its stock price underperform the broader market despite its strong auto lending business. While the company faces headwinds from higher interest rates and concentration risk in its auto loan portfolio, its digital model and potential for growth make it a worthy long-term investment.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: The article highlights Ally Financial's digital-only operating model, which helps reduce overhead expenses and drive deposit growth, providing a low-cost source of capital for the company's auto lending business. While the company faces headwinds from higher interest rates and concentration risk in its auto loan portfolio, the article suggests that Ally's core competency in auto lending and the potential for growth make it a worthy long-term investment.
